name: Beach Cleanup
description:
A local environmental group has offered to clean the beach
Will you accept?

name: No Visitors?
description:
Business is particularly slow today
Will you launch some fireworks to draw more customers?

name: Public Holiday
description:
It's a public holiday! Crowds flock to your beach
Do you want to restrict the amount of people or not?

name: Climate Proposal
description:
A local climate activism groups asks for you
to preserve a section of your beach for local wildlife
Do you accept?

name: Sea Turtle Season
description:
Some sea turtles are coming up to shore to lay eggs
Will you cordon off that section of the beach?

name: Rock Concert
description:
A local rock band called Muskets and Tulips asks
If they can perform in your beach
Do you accept?

name: Sun's Shining
description:
You notice that today is quite hot
Will you close the beach today to protect people's health?

name: Climate Boycott
description:
The climate group starts boycotting your beach
saying that you hate the climate
Will you chase them out or do nothing?

name: Celebrity Trouble
description:
A local celebrity is caught littering in your beach
Will you apprehend them which may result in bad PR?
Or let them go free?

name: Lot's of Garbage
description:
Overnight, a lot of trash has washed onto the beach
Will you close the beach and clean it up
Or keep business as usual?
